name: Sea Battles
description:
Sea Battles is a small game a made for the GBJam 7. You are the pirate ship trying to avoid enemies, shooting and grabbing some loot.

Movement - Arrows
Shooting - Z and X

(I thought I manage to do more, unfortunately this time period wasn't as good for me as I hoped it would. Hopefully you will like my one level game. I hope to continue it further!)
